annotations.description: Today we have a short episode on a crazy delicious drink from one of my favorite Bartenders. It's one of those that look like it doesn't work on paper and th...
annotations.title: The Guardian Angel, A Cocktail So Crazy It HAS To Work!

textContent:
1.25oz (17.5ml) Amaro Montenegro
.75oz (22.5ml) Overproof Rum [Wray and Nephew]
.75oz (22.5ml) Orgeat
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
3 Drops Rosewater
A couple of Cucumber Slices
Cucumber Slice Garnish

Shake with cucumber slices. 
Double strain into coupe
Garnish with cucumber slice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_tyCYQF0jPA
title: The Guardian Angel
